solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int integerReplacement(int n) {--newline--        int c = 0;--newline--        while (n != 1) {--newline--            if ((n & 1) == 0) {--newline--                n >>>= 1;--newline--            } else if (n == 3 || ((n >>> 1) & 1) == 0) {--newline--                --n;--newline--            } else {--newline--                ++n;--newline--            }--newline--            ++c;--newline--        }--newline--        return c;--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}
